title: Snowdown Rift
body: Wish they would bring back the Winter Summoners Rift. Anyone know why that never came back?

replies.body:
SR is such a big map to change... if they had to require a whole update in a preseason to change the map, how do you think they'll go with applying a new map with snow implemented into it? More particles etc...
gg

But Poro king is boring. It might have stayed fun if they didn't move the snowball to Aram as soon as it was over and I would rather have a Winter summoners Rift to play with my snow skins on instead of Poro king
Haven't they moved onto Poro King?
Wasn't it buggy as fuck and hurt the eyes so bad?
